title: Van Gogh Reborn! - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Mature   Slice of Life
tags: Artists   Child Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Familial Love   Famous Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Heartwarming   Male Protagonist   Misunderstandings   Modern Day   Multiple POV   Past Plays a Big Role   Previous Life Talent   Reincarnation   Second Chance
author: Woojin   우진
description:
Vincent van Gogh, the painter who refused to be an accessory Of power and painted with his soul at the tip of a brush, was not understood by anyone and had to die like a madman, and he woke up in 21st century Korea.


 Like a wheat field melted with gold, like a sunflower that swallowed the sun, a dazzling painter once again takes the brush.>
